title: Nordstrom Font ID please
content:
Can anyone tell me the font on this website? The NORDSTROM in the upper left corner, and the FREE SHIPPING also.

Thank you!

[http://shop.nordstrom.com/C/2375500/0~2375500](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315165529/http:/shop.nordstrom.com/C/2375500/0~2375500 "http://shop.nordstrom.com/C/2375500/0~2375500")
author: scottsch

comments.content: "Nordstrom" is a hand lettered custom logo. [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315165529/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/optima_std_complete_vp/?sample_text=NORDSTROM) is about as close as you'll get. You might like [LetterPerfect](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315165529/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LetterPerfect)'s [Florentine Set](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315165529/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/letterperfect/florentine_set_ot/) as well.

An ancient string, but GIRVIN, Inc. designed that font as the identity typeface, as well as for signing and print applications when our team created the logo and packaging program.

Tim Girvin  
................  
 [http://www.girvin.com/blog/?p=4412](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315165529/http:/www.girvin.com/blog/?p=4412 "http://www.girvin.com/blog/?p=4412")
